description: Episode number 4 of Series "Child development series". Correlated with the book "Child development" by Elizabeth B. Hurlock, Ph. D., this film discusses the major emotions of childhood; curiosity, fear, anger, jealousy and joy. Children's emotions are intense, frequent, but of short duration, and result in a number of behaviour responses.
